trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to an event.
CodeEventReferenceExpression can be used to represent a reference to an event.
trans-unit.target: CodeEventReferenceExpression 可以用于表示对事件的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property specifies the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>属性指定包含该事件的对象。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression.EventName%2A> property specifies the name of the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object and event name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeEventReferenceExpression"></xref>类使用指定的目标对象和事件名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，该值指示包含事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to reference.
Gets or sets the name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含该事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object that contains the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> ，该值指示包含事件的对象。
